item.title: About
item.description: Alex Reis is a synthetic biologist and protein engineer with a background in biophysical modeling, multiplex CRISPR interference, phage display and antibody engineering. Alex is currently a Principal Scientist at Manifold Bio, a leading biotech startup in biologics discovery. With a background in chemical engineering and synthetic biology, Alex supports the innovation arms in both the wet and dry lab sides of the company. His work has driven the scaling and quantitative accuracy of Manifold’s proprietary protein barcoding tech, as well as other (currently unpublished) assays including Î¦-seq and more.
